feed.title: Slash Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Slash: v0.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix some security vulnerabilities;
  • fix i18n AMO links by @Gitoffthelawn in https://github.com/boojack/slash/pull/38

New Contributors

  • @Gitoffthelawn made their first contribution in https://github.com/boojack/slash/pull/38
  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/boojack/slash/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/boojack/slash/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6

entry.title: New release for Slash: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's New

Introducing Collections(c/collection), helps you easily manage and share your shortcuts.

See more in getting started with collections.

entry.title: New release for Slash: v0.5.1
entry.content:
New Loaded

  • üêò PostgreSQL is supported. #49

    You can use PostgreSQL as database with the following startup command:

    docker run -d --name slash -p 5231:5231 -v ~/.slash/:/var/opt/slash yourselfhosted/slash:latest --driver postgres --dsn 'postgresql://postgres:PASSWORD@localhost:5432/slash'

What's Changed

  • Update the form of creating shortcuts: only name and link are required; #50
  • chore: remove the "-temp" part of the shortcut name in the extension by @RealFascinated in https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/pull/47

New Contributors

  • @RealFascinated made their first contribution in https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

entry.title: New release for Slash: v0.5.3
entry.content:
Fixed issues: https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/issues/66, https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/issues/65

What's Changed

  • fix: public shortcuts not showing up in public collections by @xwjdsh in https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/pull/63

New Contributors

  • @xwjdsh made their first contribution in https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/pull/63

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3
